about.details:
Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers Limited was founded in 2009 and offers financial training, consulting and learning services.

The company mainly focuses on the area of financial education and awareness, which refers to the knowledge and understanding of various financial concepts and skills that enable learners to make informed and responsible decisions in financial matters. This includes the ability to manage money effectively, budget wisely, save and invest prudently, and understand basic financial products and services.

The organization's learners include various categories of participants such as students (both in active training and qualified applicants), recent graduates (collectively referred to as students), individuals who are not currently employed, and homemakers (collectively referred to as learners) through financial education and financial literacy courses, seminars, events, and materials.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Proven track record of trainers: Thecompnya's trainers have a proven track record in financial education and financial literacy, making them highly effective.
    Brand image: The company has a recognized name and reputation for quality in its field of operation and has considerable experience and a credible track record in financial education.
  • Technology-driven, asset-neutral, and scalable business model: The company uses state-of-the-art technology to deliver its courses, allowing learners to use up-to-date course content and learn at their own pace.
  • Focus on practice and learning: The company relies on the practice-oriented teaching method to provide course participants with knowledge that helps them achieve appropriate and sustainable financial freedom.
  • Diverse course offering: The company offers a wide range of financial education solutions through its courses, including short-term courses, long-term courses, expert courses, continuing education and retraining courses.
  • Pandemic-tested model: The COVID-19 pandemic has led to unique global and industry-wide challenges, including challenges to the offline learning business model and the transition of the offline learning business model to an online model.

As of December 30, 2023, the company employed 12 full-time employees and 2 professional trainers under the professional employment model.

faqs.question: What is the Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO is a SME IPO of 1530000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.12 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 12, 2024, and closes on September 17, 2024.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO opens on September 12, 2024 and closes on September 17, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO?
faqs.answer: Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO will be done on Wednesday, September 18, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, September 19, 2024. Check the Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sodhani Academy of Fintech Enablers IPO listing date is on Friday, September 20, 2024.
